sqlMap.select: select id,user_id as user,font,background_color as backgroundColor,font_color as fontColor,create_time as createTime from t_reader where id=#id#;
select id,user_id as user,font,background_color as backgroundColor,font_color as fontColor,create_time as createTime from t_reader order by create_time desc limit #start#,#limit#;
select id,user_id as user,font,background_color as backgroundColor,font_color as fontColor,create_time as createTime from t_reader order by create_time desc where user_id=#userId#;
sqlMap.update: update t_reader set user_id=#userId#, font=#font#,background_color=#backgroundColor#, font_color=#fontColor# where id=#id#;
